title: Narendra Modi's Twitter account hacked with announcement India would adopt Bitcoin
content:
1. Narendra Modi's Twitter account hacked with announcement India would adopt Bitcoin  CNN
  2. Indian PM Narendra Modi's hacked Twitter account told 73.4 million followers that the country would distribute 500 bitcoins among its citizens  Yahoo Finance
  3. Hacker Breaks Into Prime Minister's Twitter Account, Tells 73 Million Followers India's Switching to Bitcoin  The Daily Beast
  4. India's opposition raises alarm over Modi's hacked Twitter  Associated Press
  5. India Investigates Hacking of Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s Twitter Account  The Wall Street Journal
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
